long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Attoli is your smart reading companion, designed to make online content more manageable. With Attoli, you can quickly summarize any highlighted text or entire web pages, extracting the key points in seconds. Whether you're researching, studying, or just browsing, Attoli helps you save time and stay focused. Get quick, easy-to-understand summaries of articles, blogs, reports, and more—right from your browser.

Our Key Features:
• Highlight & Summarize: Simply highlight any portion of text on a web page to get an instant summary.
• Full-Page Summaries: Summarize entire articles or web pages with a single click.
• Easy to Use: Intuitive design lets you summarize content quickly and effortlessly.
• Secure & Private: Your data is processed securely using industry-standard encryption.
• Free & Member Tiers: Enjoy basic features for free, with options to upgrade for unlimited access.

Streamline your reading experience with Attoli and get more done in less time!
